name: Hirondelles
description:
Hirondelles is a puzzle game where the protagonist is a Swallow trying to find its friends and get them to the outside where they can fly freely once again.

It is still a work in progress so we hope to have it finished in the near future.

Controls:
- Movements : W / A / S / D
- Interaction: E / Right click
- R: Restart level
- Quit: Escape

Credits:

- Grégoire Boiron ( https://twitter.com/GrayGzou) - Programmer

- Laury C - Support
